comment.author: 61013804@N08
comment._content: The upper photo is the same as in City of Victoria 四環九約 2nd ed 1999 p. 53. The street sign above the big porch on the left said Tung Loi Street 東來街 present day Tung Loi Lane, between Connaught Road West and Wing Lok Street. The decorations in the centre is for the royal visit of Prince Albert Victor and Prince George (later King George V) in 1881.
